step-3.title: Rental as it is
step-3.des-1: Please submit the required documents and pay after selecting the bike.
step-3.des-2: If there is no problem, you can ride a motorcycle and drive in Phnom Penh.
step-3.des-3: We also rent helmets for customers who wish.

sec-1.title: I. Business Days and Hours
sec-1.q1: Q: What time do you open?
sec-1.a1: We do rent a moto for first customers from 9am - 5:30pm, and close shop at 6pm.
sec-1.q2: Q: What day do you close?
sec-1.a2: On Sundays and Cambodian national holidays.

sec-2.title: II.  Rental Conditions
sec-2.q1: Q: What is necessary for renting motorcycle?
sec-2.a1: As a deposit, you need customer’s passport or deposit fee. The deposit fee ranges from $300 – $900, the deposit fee amount depends on motorcycle type. We can relax deposit conditions if you request long-term rental. We can do small credit inquiry for deposit relax. After the inspection, we can answer how much deposit relax is available for you.
sec-2.q2: Q: I want to rent a motorcycle to go to Cambodian province. Can I rent a moto?
sec-2.a2: Sorry, we ask customers to drive within Phnom Penh area only. We cannot rent a moto if you drive outside of Phnom Penh.
sec-2.q3: Q: I want to do 1 day rent. Is it possible?
sec-2.a3: Sorry, the minimum rental period is 1 week. If you’d like to rent less than 1 week, you need to pay 1 week rental fee.

sec-3.title: III. Rental Price and Payment Way
sec-3.q1: Q: How much is the rental fee?
sec-3.a1: It depends on motorcycle type. Monthly rental fee is $60 -$130. Weekly rental fee is $21 - $50. The rental fee gets cheaper when you rent longer.
sec-3.q2: Q: Can I extend to use a motorcycle while I rent it?
sec-3.a2: Yes, this is OK. The extension fee is according to the price table in our shop.

sec-4.title: IV. Rental Motorcycle Type
sec-4.q1: Q: What kind of motors can I rent from you?
sec-4.a1: In our shop, 50cc automatic, 100 – 125cc automatic and manual motorcycles are available for rent.
sec-4.q2: Q: Do you rent big size motorbike?
sec-4.a2: Sorry, at present all of the motorcycles are scooter type. The maximum engine size of motors is 150cc.

sec-5.title: V. Safeties and Securities Equipment
sec-5.a1: Yes, you can rent 1 helmet for free. You need to pay $5 per helmet if you rent more helmet.
sec-5.q2: Q: What type of equipment is available for motorcycle securities?
sec-5.a2: A front lock is equipped at the front wheel. It blocks wheel turn. And a chain key is available for rent if you like.
sec-5.q3: Q: Does a rental moto have any insurance?
sec-5.a3: Sorry, at present no moto has insurance in our shop. You need to pay repair fee when damaged and pay compensation fee when stolen.
sec-5.q4: Q: When the motorcycle is stolen, what should I do?
sec-5.a4: Please contact to our shop as soon as possible. We need to go to police to make a report. And you need to pay compensation fee written in the contract.

sec-6.title: VI. About Booking
sec-6.q1: Q: I want to reserve a motorcycle, how can I do it?
sec-6.a1: You can apply for the reservation with the online form on this website, on the phone, and with visit to our shop EMC.We will make a reply after checking up our customer situation and motorcycle condition.
sec-6.q2: Q: When and what time can I make the reservation?
sec-6.a2: We can welcome you about Internet reservation every time. Reservation with phone call is reserved from Monday – Saturday, from 9am – 6pm.

sec-7.title: VII. The Service We Don’t Do
sec-7.q1: Q: Do you take insurance on each moto?
sec-7.a1: Sorry, we don’t take insurance on motorbikes.
sec-7.q2: Q: Can I rent a motorcycle with a driver?
sec-7.a2: Sorry, we don’t rent a motorcycle with a driver.
sec-7.q3: Q: Do you do delivery service?
sec-7.a3: Sorry, at present we don’t do delivery service.
sec-7.q4: Q: Can I buy a motorcycle from your shop?
sec-7.a4: Sorry, we don’t sell motorcycles to customers.

sec-1.title: I. About visa
sec-1.q1: Q: I'd like to know new information about visa rules.

a1.line-2: Yes, we do. Even if the Cambodia visa renewal deadline comes while you are renting a motorcycle, you can extend your visa during the rental if you apply in advance.

sec-1.q2: Q: How long does it take to get my passport with a renewed visa?
sec-1.a2: It takes one to two weeks. Depending on the season, the number of days required for renewal will change. The Visa Renewal Office is closed on Saturdays, Sundays and national holidays. If the immigration office's holiday falls between the renewal periods, it will take days. It may be delayed due to the reasons of the Immigration Bureau. When extending your visa, please allow enough time for your stay.
sec-1.note: For updates on visa information, please visit Twitter or Facebook. This is the information as of August 2020.
sec-1.q3: Q. What is the FPCS required for visa extension?

a3.line-1: A Cambodian system for managing the addresses of foreigners living in Cambodia. Registration is the responsibility of the landlord. If you are not registered, you will not be able to extend your visa, so please register in advance.
a3.line-2: If you want to register from someone other than the landlord, please get permission from the landlord.

sec-1.q4: Q.What are my options for long-stay visas?

a4.line-1: For a long stay, first get a Business Visa (E).
a4.line-2: You can stay in Cambodia for one month. During your stay, please apply for an extension at an agency like ours. You can choose to extend your stay from 1 month, 3 months, 6 months or 12 months.
a4.line-3: Here is a diagram showing the options here.
a4.line-4: It can be extended to one of the following four types.
a4.line-5: ・If you are looking for a job, Job Seeker Visa (EG)
a4.line-6: ・Business visa (EB) if you have a fixed job
a4.line-8: ・Retirement visa (ER) for those who are retired
a4.line-9: Job seeker visas (EG) can be extended for up to 6 months and the other three types can be extended up to 1 year.

sec-1.q5: Q:Please tell me the period and price that can be extended with a visa.

a5.line-1: There are four types of period that can be extended: 1 month ($51), 3 months ($81), 6 months ($164), and 12 months ($294). For customers who do not rent a motorcycle, $5 will be added.
a5.line-2: There is no difference in price depending on the type of visa.

sec-1.q6: Q. Please tell me the documents required for extension.

a6.line-2: ・Print a screen showing that the address has been registered with FPCS by using the app
a6.line-3: ● Obtain eVisa for electronic application and enter Japan
a6.line-4: ・Print the certificate of the eVisa application (sent as an email attachment)
a6.line-5: Extensions from Business Visas (E) can be listed here.
a6.line-7: ・Oath with the reason for requesting extension
a6.line-9: ・Certificate of employment or patent with the name of the visa applicant (business tax payment certificate)
a6.line-10: ● Renewal from EG visa to EB visa or business visa (EB) for one or three months
a6.line-13: ・A certificate of enrollment issued by a school registered with the Ministry of Education
a6.line-15: ・If you are 55 or older, an oath that describes your income and how to earn it. If you are under 55 years old, the income certificate containing the translation certificate of the embassy.

sec-1.q7: Q. I don't know how to write documents for visa extension.

a7.line-1: Our shop provides a service for those who want to omit the submission of documents.
a7.line-5: The service will be provided for an additional fee.

sec-1.q8: Q: I have a tourist visa. Can I extend my stay?
sec-1.a8: You can extend it. However, extension is only once. You can only extend it for one month. If you plan to stay for more than 2 months, please obtain a business visa (changed to a general visa for arrivals) at the embassy in advance.
sec-1.q9: Q:How long does it take to get my visa renewed?

a9.line-1: It takes one to two weeks. The waiting time may be longer due to immigration bureau and Cambodia holidays. Meanwhile, the immigration office keeps your passport.
a9.line-2: If you want to bring your passport immediately, you can use the express visa service. By paying an additional fee (+$75), delivery will be possible the next business day morning.

sec-1.q10: Q: I want to stay in Cambodia for a long time, so I want to change from a tourist visa (T) to a business visa (E). Can I change it?
sec-1.a10: Visa types cannot be changed within Cambodia. Please go abroad and get your visa again.
sec-1.q11: Q: My visa has expired. Can you accept it?
sec-1.a11: It is possible to accept. If you are overstaying, there is an additional charge of $10 per day.
sec-1.q12: Q: How long do I have to pay for the additional charges?
sec-1.a12: If you can come by 11am on the deadline, there will be no additional charge.
